entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Brandon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -22.6°C

Condition: Mainly Sunny

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
